dc:title: Notes By The Way - November 1945
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Deeply personal account of being with her dying mother.Includes prayers and meditations on death and dying. Prays to the Little Flower for her mother. Evidence of answered prayer came in a variety of roses from different sources.
